rules.name: High Glucose Alert
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates high glucose and nurse input mentions 'diabetes' or 'hyperglycemia'.
rules.generated_alert: Potential for unstable blood glucose. Monitor blood sugar and administer insulin as prescribed.

rules.name: Low Potassium Alert
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates low potassium and nurse input mentions 'muscle weakness' or 'arrhythmia'.
rules.generated_alert: Risk for cardiac dysrhythmias due to hypokalemia. Assess for cardiac symptoms and administer potassium supplement.

rules.name: Elevated Creatinine
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates elevated creatinine and nurse input mentions 'kidney' or 'renal'.
rules.generated_alert: Impaired renal function. Monitor kidney function tests and fluid balance.
